sub_title: Client Relation Lead at IBM - Service Logistics
summary: Experienced Team Lead with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Strong operations professional skilled in Business Process, Operations Management, Demand Planning, Business Process Improvement, and IT Service Management.

profile_positions.description:
As Client Relation Lead I ensure a positive and solid operational relationship with the Lenovo Team and be focal point for escalations. Timely and honest communication is key.

I provide monthly KPI reporting to Executive management, manage Root Cause Analysis on deviations, develop and implement improvement plans to meet the contractually agreed targets.

It is important to create and improve processes and measurement to support the growing business of client Lenovo and to reduce cost while keeping a good balance with service.
profile_positions.title: SPO EMEA Client Relation Lead for Lenovo DCG

profile_positions.description:
The main goal in this team is supporting to manage the operational performance for IBM Logo.

I work on (re-) connecting the teams in Service Planning (Service Planning representatives, SME's, OLCM's, Delivery Process Analysts) to have a complete picture of the performance in terms of KPI's on products, process and financials. Together we pro-actively identify out of line situations and define actions for improvements. There is a regular interlock with the RTS managers and the IMT delivery teams. We monitor Parts usage and related Maintenance Cost, and try to find initiatives for cost reduction.

I support and coordinate the definition of requirements, setup and development of the metrics for the processes. Set up and constantly improving a consistent management system in reporting to the CCT/Cluster managers, providing performance figures, analyzing data, detecting out of line situations, defining and gathering root causes and define actions for improvements
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - EMEA Service Planning

profile_positions.description: Support the SPO business processes and applications and improve where possible, taking into account the customer and the cost. Create mutual understanding and cooperation between the different application owners. Coordinate Work Requests and bring the right persons together to work on the best solutions.
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Custodian team

profile_positions.description: Support to optimize the balance between service, inventory and costs with 2 planning tools, Location Planning and Network Neighborhood in a multicultural working environment. Improving measurements on serviceability, reducing inventory without impacting serviceability. Coordinated an international team (±15 people) located in different countries. I have worked to centralize the team from many different European colleagues into one Hungarian team. I have prepared and given many education sessions.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - Country Planning

profile_positions.description:
Implementation specialist Network Neighborhood.
With the team we have prepared and implemented 10 major countries in this sophisticated planning tool. We have started with a pilot phase for DACH and transformed that into an IT solution with user interfaces in close cooperation with BT/ IT department. After implementation we have continuously worked on optimizations in planning. I have hosted multiple workshops for new planners and created education material.
profile_positions.title: Service Logistic Specialist - Implementation team Network Neighborhood

profile_positions.description: Planning spare parts for the Nordic countries. Reached both the Serviceability targets and the Inventory target each year. I have been the educator/coach for new colleagues at the department
profile_positions.title: Service Logistic Specialist - Country Planner
